dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4445 IH: Public Health and Bio-Preparedness Workforce Loan Repayment Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crow (for himself, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Mrs. Trahan, and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a public health and bio-preparedness workforce loan repayment program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Public Health and Bio-Preparedness Workforce Loan Repayment Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of Public Health and Bio-Preparedness Workforce Loan Repayment Program
section.text: Section 776(i) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 295fâ€“1(i)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2023 through 2025 and inserting fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
